de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.projections

Interface Projection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HierarchicalResult, Result
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FullProjection, Projection1D, Projection2D, ProjectionParallel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFullProjection, AbstractProjection, AbstractSimpleProjection, AffineProjection, OPTICSProjection, Simple1D, Simple2D, SimpleParallel

    public interface Projection
extends HierarchicalResult
    Base interface used for projections in the ELKI visualizers. There are specialized interfaces for 1D and 2D that only compute the projections in the required dimensions!

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double SCALE
      Scaling constant.
